item.title: Getting server online
item.dc:creator: @Mattslone Mattslone
item.description:
@Mattslone wrote:

Add this it might help its from http://www.thehelper.net/forums/showthread.php?t=53845

here it is

This is my Guid on how to make a private Runescape 2 Server.
This is 100% Legal!
Diffaculty: 1/10
Assumed Knowladge: Common sense

Step 1: Get MoparScape

Go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf and look at the top, it will say download Mopar scape. You know what to do from here.

Step 2: Installation

Run Moparinstall.exe (That was mine, it’s not hard to find in your downloaded folder.) Just click next Until installation is done.

Step 3: Play

Click Moparscape.jar or runmoparscape. Click “Create server” Now go and click play, login with any account name and passowrd.

Step 4: Commands

here are some commands

::pickup 0995 1000 (Gives you 1000 Gold, type more or less it don’t matter)
::npc 1 (Spawns a Man, experiment with these.)
::Kick X (X=Player name it’s obvious)

That’s about it.

~Deathboy312

Read full topic
